meanings.definition: Relating to or involving the conversion of energy in living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The bioenergetic process in plants helps them grow and produce oxygen.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the bioenergetic aspects of cells to understand how they function.
meanings.sent3: The bioenergetic dance of the mitochondria keeps the cell party going.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm was like a bioenergetic spark that lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The bioenergetic nature of the sun fuels life on Earth.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the study of energy transformations in living organisms.
meanings.sent1: Bioenergetic research aims to uncover the secrets of energy flow in organisms.
meanings.sent2: The bioenergetic field explores how energy moves within living beings.
meanings.sent3: The bioenergetic investigation into squirrel energy levels was surprisingly intense.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a bioenergetic glow that hinted at her passion for biology.
meanings.sent5: The bioenergetic analysis of the ecosystem revealed fascinating patterns.
